examples: It seemed incredible that she had been there a week already.
Parecía increíble que ya llevara allí una semana.
It's just incredible to me that only one person was hurt.
Para mí es increíble que solo una persona haya resultado herida.
It really is incredible how she managed to get away with it.
Realmente es increíble cómo se las arregló para salirse con la suya.
